title: Dolan Twins 'move on' from weekly YouTube videos in Shane Dawson video
text:
The Dolan Twins – Ethan and Grayson – have announced they’ll be ‘moving on’ from weekly YouTube videos, opening up about their mental health and burnout to Shane Dawson.

The pair, who have been uploading weekly videos since they were 14, explained that the pressure has become too much for them.

‘I do feel like I’m letting people down and it does take a toll on my mental health,’ Grayson said of breaks the pair have taken in the past.

The 19-year-old twins spoke out about a multitude of factors that have resulted in their decision to cut back on posting videos, explaining that they feel pressured to put on personas that don’t reflect who they are anymore.

The twins opened up about the loss of their father (Picture: YouTube/Dolan Twins)

They went on to say that they struggled to mourn their father after his tragic death from cancer earlier this year.

‘Had we not been filming a video every week, we would have been able to spend more time with our family around the time that they needed us,’ Ethan told Shane.

Grayson added: ‘It’s f**ked, because I still don’t even sometimes realise that it happened.’

The pair took a month off from making videos after the loss of their father, but admitted it still felt like ‘too long’.

Instead of continuing to churn out a video every week, the duo explained that they intend to work on videos they truly feel passionate about.

‘If we have the proper amount of time, we can create something that we really love, that our viewers will love as well,’ they said.

‘Let’s do crazy s*** because we can’ (Picture: YouTube/Dolan Twins)

Signing off the video, Ethan told fans: ‘Our fans, you guys, have truly blessed us. I want to explore what this opportunity that I was blessed with allows me to explore.

‘I want to live the boundary-breaking, abnormal lifestyle this opportunity allows me to live, not limit my lifestyle because of this opportunity.’

He went on to say: ‘Let’s do crazy s*** because we can, not do little things because we have to.’

The twins opened up to Shane Dawson (Picture: YouTube/Dolan Twins)

Grayson added: ‘I honestly haven’t been this excited for the future in a really long time.’

Fans have been quick to share messages of support for the twins, with one writing: ‘I’m going into mom mode… you two need to take time to find your true happiness.’

‘This genuinely made me tear up , there was so much emotion and feeling in this video . happy for the twins on this new chapter they are starting,’ another added.

‘It’s insane what these two have gone through,’ one more fan pointed out. ‘My heart goes out to them.’
